0.2.name: wordpress/encodingcom-wordpress-plugin
0.2.description:
Encoding.com WordPress Plugin allows you to quickly and easily add video from your mac or windows computer into your blog posts by using the encoding.com platform as a video transcoder. Plugin is easy to use and comes with a simple setting page, and it does not overwhelm you with complicated customizable options.

Here are some features that come with this plugin:

  1. Easy video upload from your blog admin
  2. Fast transcoding on encoding.com servers
  3. Transcoded video automatically uploading to your FTP
  4. Video automatically appears in your blog post as soon as it converted
  5. Media library of uploaded videos

You'll need an account on Encoding.com If you don't have already one signing up is easy and only takes a few minutes.
